flawed_nl_solution:
There are 900 - 42 = <<900-42=588>>588 feet of path to line.
There are poles every 6 feet, so the company needs 588 / 6 = <<588/6=98>>98 poles.
The poles have to go on both sides of the path, so there will be 98 * 2 = <<98*2=196>>196 fence poles along the whole path.
#### 196

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 858, not 588. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
